headline.main: 6 New Jersey Firefighters Exposed to Chemicals, Hospitalized
headline.print_headline: 6 New Jersey Firefighters Exposed to Chemicals, Hospitalized

docs.snippet: Six New Jersey firefighters who were exposed to a "chemical haze" pouring out of a warehouse have been taken to a hospital....
docs.lead_paragraph: Six New Jersey firefighters who were exposed to a "chemical haze" pouring out of a warehouse have been taken to a hospital.

headline.main: Ending the Ramadan Fast With an Indonesian Feast
headline.print_headline: An Indonesian Feast to End the Fast

docs.snippet: A Boston chef scours the region for ingredients to recreate Eid al-Fitr meals from childhood....
docs.abstract: Retno Pratiwi recreates dishes from her Indonesian childhood and Islamic heritage at Kaki Lima, East Boston pop-up restaurant she runs with husband Peter Gelling; recipes for Indonesian chicken curry (opor ayam) and shrimp and potatoes in sambal (sambal goreng kentang udang) offered.
docs.lead_paragraph: A Boston chef scours the region for ingredients to recreate Eid al-Fitr meals from childhood.

docs.lead_paragraph: At about the same time newly minted members of the U.S. Olympic track team get their uniforms, they'll be led to a TV monitor featuring a map of Rio de Janeiro with three dots: the athletes' village, the track team's training center and Olympic Stadium.

headline.main: Germany Forced to Make Key Changes for Semi-Final
headline.print_headline: Germany Forced to Make Key Changes for Semi-Final

docs.snippet: Germany coach Joachim Loew has been forced to make changes to his team for Thursday's semi-final against hosts France at Euro 2016 because of injuries and a suspension, including replacing key goalscorer Mario Gomez....
docs.lead_paragraph: Germany coach Joachim Loew has been forced to make changes to his team for Thursday's semi-final against hosts France at Euro 2016 because of injuries and a suspension, including replacing key goalscorer Mario Gomez.

docs.lead_paragraph: Cyber-security firm Darktrace said it has raised $65 million in an equity funding round led by U.S. private equity firm KKR & Co LP, valuing the company at more than $400 million.

docs.snippet: BROWN--Roscoe. The Association for a Better New York mourns the loss of longstanding board member Roscoe C. Brown, Jr. Dr. Brown was an educator, a civic leader, and a member of the famed Tuskegee Airmen. He was a hero who will be missed. William ...
docs.lead_paragraph:
BROWN--Roscoe. The Association for a Better New York mourns the loss of longstanding board member Roscoe C. Brown, Jr. Dr. Brown was an educator, a civic leader, and a member of the famed Tuskegee Airmen. He was a hero who will be missed.

William C. Rudin, Chairman

docs.snippet: GUTTERMAN--Shirley. The Gutterman Family, The Board of Directors and all the Employees of Gutterman's Funeral Home and Gutterman-Warheit Memorial Chapel mourn the loss of our Esteemed and Beloved Mother and CEO. She was a very strong willed woman ...
docs.lead_paragraph:
GUTTERMAN--Shirley.

The Gutterman Family, The Board of Directors and all the Employees of Gutterman's Funeral Home and Gutterman-Warheit Memorial Chapel mourn the loss of our Esteemed and Beloved Mother and CEO. She was a very strong willed woman who was never afraid to speak her mind or help someone in need. She was a female pioneer in the nursing profession for over 40 years before becoming involved in the funeral industry. She was instrumental in growing the company to what it has become today, one of the largest family owned and operating Jewish Funeral Homes in the country. Her dedication to her job, patients and family were second to none. She will always be remembered for her quick wit, great memory, class and generosity. She cared so very much about everyone and was truly interested in everything that her family and friends were involved with. She will be greatly missed and remembered every day by all who had the privilege to know her and love her. Rest in Peace. Services Thursday, July 7, 12 noon at Gutterman's, 8000 Jericho Turnpike, Woodbury, NY. There will be a memorial service in Florida at a later date.

docs.snippet: PEARSON--Patricia, of Bellerose on July 4, 2016. Devoted mother of James and Thomas, grandmother of John and Mark. Friends may call July 7 from 2-5 and 7-9:30 pm at Thomas F. Dalton Funeral Home, 125 Hillside Avenue, New Hyde Park....
docs.lead_paragraph: PEARSON--Patricia, of Bellerose on July 4, 2016. Devoted mother of James and Thomas, grandmother of John and Mark. Friends may call July 7 from 2-5 and 7-9:30 pm at Thomas F. Dalton Funeral Home, 125 Hillside Avenue, New Hyde Park.
